name: Laue
tagline: A Personal Website for Scott Laue
body:
## Education

### General Links

[Blackboard](elearn.uta.edu)

[MyMav](https://sis-portal-prod.uta.edu/psp/AEPPRD/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/?&cmd=login&errorCode=106&languageCd=ENG)

[MavMail](http://www.outlook.com/mavs.uta.edu)

### LING 2301-001 MoWeFr 10:00AM - 10:50AM GS 104

Utilizes Blackboard and Textbook equally. Class primarily centered around the reading and the lecture is used to briefly point out certain elements in the reading. 

#### Notes:

Many of the explanations in class are overdeveloped for this course. New teacher may be relying on advanced knowledge to explain unfamiliar concepts. Recommended Study: Reading Notes and Slide Reviews

### PHYS 1443-006 LAB Mo 12:00PM - 2:50PM SH  114

Initial class will be Sept. 14. 

#### Notes:

Lab manual will be required.

### PHYS 1443-003 Technical Physics I Lecture TuThu 11:00AM-12:20PM

General Physics course that is primarily lecture through slides. Attendance not required, but recommended. Only basic calculus knowledge required.

#### Special Links:

[Slides and Syllabus](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/b0e6elasdfaayx2/AADO-4W2RaVMYueHctr3XYQ-a?dl=0) 

#### Notes:

Homework and quizzes will be used in Mastering Physics. Need to purchase that.

### CSE 1320-003 TuTh 12:30PM - 1:50PM SH  125

Introduction to C.

#### Special Links:

[Slides and Syllabus](https://sites.google.com/site/gustavopuertosouza/home/cse-1320)

#### Notes:

Book will be largely useless for the class. Look for a book that encompasses both C and C++. Bring Computer to class for in-class homework.

### CSE 2315-003 TuTh 2:00PM - 3:20PM NH  203

Discrete Structures. Mathematical representation of logic.

#### Notes: 

This is an incredibly exact and demanding. Make sure to read the text and do the homework. Since I have a different book, Gao has placed the book on reserve in the SEL. Corresponding reading chapters between the two versions:

>    6th  Edition                              7th Edition
>    Chapter  1                   --->         Chapt 1
>    Chapt    2                   --->         Chapts 2 & 3
>    Chapt    3                   --->         Chapt 4
>    Chapt    4                   --->         Chapt 5
>    Chapt    5                   --->         Chapt 6
>    Chapt    6                   --->         Chapt 7

## Other
